attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and it took 4 hours to download. After that it said in order to continue on I must put my peen in a waffle iron and say “trump 2020” on repeat for 5 hours. I was ok with the waffle iron part but the trump 2020 I just couldn’t see myself doing so I think this app isn’t for me and isn’t for the 180,209 people who gave this a 1 star. go tiktok!
attributes.title: I got my peen stuck in a waffle iron for what?

attributes.review: I opened the app and literally nothing was working, all of the words and buttons just fell to the bottom of the screen as if they were being held on to a wall with a very thin nail. Idk man this app also makes my phone smell horrible. Like all I can smell every time I open it is spray tan and sexual predators. It’s honestly really gross, uninstalling immediately.
attributes.title: Can’t function at all

attributes.review: This app is horrible!! I just wanted to see our Cheeto president but the app kept on lagging and glitching!! Then it made weird noises at night which woke up my zebra!! Then i tried to walk my roaches when the app started taking pictures!! How? I don’t know but I had to delete it immediately. I’m extremely upset I DO NOT!! recommend this product. Do not waste your time on this or anything!!
attributes.title: ✨h o r r i b l e✨

attributes.review: Right off the bat the app wouldn’t open and when it did it kept asking me to tweet horrible things. Of course I didn’t want to but then it started to harass me and when it asked me what my gender and age was (which I thought was odd) it started telling me I couldn’t vote because I’m a woman! Well they didn’t say women but I’m not going to repeat those awful words.
attributes.title: Honest Truth

attributes.review: I got the app and I have to say I’m so disappointed. Like I opened it to see a Cheeto puff looking at me. And then I swiped and saw a orange man. And let me tell u I was so scared. It was the most scary I’ve ever seen. This app was such a disappointment😘🎉🧚🏼❤️✨but I mean so are u mr. puff  so I don’t know why I expected better🙄😒 Also I recommend that u quit ur job Bc it’s not gonna get any better😊🌸✨🥰
attributes.title: It’s a disappointment just like u🧚🏼✨🥳❤️

attributes.review:
This is the worst app I’ve ever gotten I waited five weeks for it to download and it just downloaded today I went on it and it has nothing on it it has nothing to save America and he’s trying to take away the kids TickTok that’s not OK when there’s a whole bunch of other things he should be worried about.
~ With many love big booty Judy Karen🙄
attributes.title: He can’t stop us👁👄👁.   Save tictok✨

attributes.review: I got this app so I could review his policies and stay up to date. To be fair, I am not a supporter but do like to stay in the loop with both runners and this seemed the easiest way to do that without googling it every week. I dislike that it made me give away my phone number immediately and it doesn’t really function that great.
attributes.title: I just wanted information

attributes.review: Hey y’all. This is my first time leaving a review. My husband Jim and I were hoping to use this app to stay up to date about our president but we were very disappointed. The app is glitchy and poorly formatted. It notified us every two minutes about a new event that we didn’t know how to stop. We ended up deleting it within a day. DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WAS AWFUL!!
attributes.title: Very Disappointing

attributes.review: This app SUUUUCCKS I opened and it immediately gave me violent, explosive diarrhea. As I ran to the bathroom, my dog started bitting me vigorously. I ran to the toilet only to find trump stickers all over the walls and the floor. And then as I turned my head to the side I saw the shower curtains move so I yanked the curtain and, to my surprise DONALD TRUMP AND MIKE PENCE WERE MAKEOUT IN MY SHOWER. I scream as loud as I could but trump attacked me and mike pence ran out of the room. In conclusion, this app is the worst. One start.

I saw online that this app was really useful but it took 12 weeks to finally get it downloaded. Then once it did it started sending messaging all the contacts in my phone photos from my camera roll. The worst part was that it took another 12 weeks to delete the app. WOULD NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Disappointed
